configuration_schema.description: Configuration model information of tunnel group.

tunnel-group.description: The configuration information of tunnel group.

group-id.description: Configure ID of tunnel group.It is between [1,32768].

type.description: You can configure ring tunnel group or linear tunnel group.

protect-type.description: Configure protection type of linear tunnel group.

protect-direction.description: Configure protection switching type of linear tunnel group.

protect-receiver.description: Configure protection receiving type of linear tunnel group.

working-tunnel.description: Configure working tunnel of linear tunnel group.No default value, must configure.

protect-tunnel.description: Configure protection tunnel of linear tunnel group.No default value, must configure.

protect-strategy.description: Configure protection switching strategy of linear tunnel group.No default value, must configure.

protect-type.description: Configure protection type of ring tunnel group.You can only configure protection type as "ring".

working-tunnel.description: Configure working tunnel of ring tunnel group.No default value, must configure.

protect-tunnel.description: Configure ring protection tunnel of ring tunnel group.The tunnel must be ring tunnel.No default value, must configure.

protect-section.description: Configure protection section of ring tunnel group.No default value, must configure.

working-tunnel-tail-aps-id.description: Configure APS ID of working tunnel tail node in ring tunnel group.No default value, must configure.

tunnel-group-state.description: Query tunnel group status information, the group ID is between [1,4294967295].Support queries without conditions and at protection group ID query.

group-id.description: Configure ID of tunnel group.It is between [1,32768].

type.description: You can configure ring tunnel group or linear tunnel group.

protect-type.description: Configure protection type of linear tunnel group.

protect-direction.description: Configure protection switching type of linear tunnel group.

protect-receiver.description: Configure protection receiving type of linear tunnel group.

working-tunnel.description: Configure working tunnel of linear tunnel group.No default value, must configure.

protect-tunnel.description: Configure protection tunnel of linear tunnel group.No default value, must configure.

protect-strategy.description: Configure protection switching strategy of linear tunnel group.No default value, must configure.

protect-type.description: Configure protection type of ring tunnel group.You can only configure protection type as "ring".

working-tunnel.description: Configure working tunnel of ring tunnel group.No default value, must configure.

protect-tunnel.description: Configure ring protection tunnel of ring tunnel group.The tunnel must be ring tunnel.No default value, must configure.

protect-section.description: Configure protection section of ring tunnel group.No default value, must configure.

working-tunnel-tail-aps-id.description: Configure APS ID of working tunnel tail node in ring tunnel group.No default value, must configure.

protect-receiver.description: Configure protection receiving type of linear tunnel group.

working-tunnel.description: Configure working tunnel of linear tunnel group.No default value, must configure.

protect-strategy.description: Configure protection switching strategy of linear tunnel group.No default value, must configure.

protect-type.description: Configure protection type of ring tunnel group.You can only configure protection type as "ring".
